Sheep

Sheep are temporary mobs created by the Wand of Flock. They appear as woolly creatures and make “baa” sounds when interacted with.

Behavior

  • Temporary: Sheep have a limited lifespan and will disappear after a certain time
  • Passive: Do not attack or engage in combat
  • Interactable: When talked to, they make random “baa” sounds
  • Fragile: Cannot take damage (damage() method does nothing)

Technical Details

  • Java Class: WandOfFlock.Sheep
  • Inherits From: NPC
  • Sprite Configuration: Uses spritesDesc/Sheep.json for appearance

Strategy

  • Sheep are harmless and serve primarily as a visual effect from the Wand of Flock
  • They can block passages temporarily during combat situations

See Also

  • Wand of Flock
  • NPCs
  • Spells
